There is only one happiness in this life, to love and be loved.
Love yourself. It is important to stay positive because beauty comes from the inside out.
Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
If you have only one smile in you give it to the people you love.
Let us always meet each other with smile, for the smile is the beginning of love.
"Where there is love there is life."
"We are most alive when we are in love."
"Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none."
A good teacher can inspire hope, ignite the imagination, and instill a love of learning.
A successful marriage requires falling in love many times, always with the same person.
"Keep love in your heart. A life without it is like a sunless garden when the flowers are dead."
Love will find a way through paths where wolves fear to prey.
The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
I love you the more in that I believe you had liked me for my own sake and for nothing else.
To be brave is to love someone unconditionally, without expecting anything in retur
Only do what your heart tells you.
True love stories never have endings.
The most important thing a father can do for his children is to love their mother.
Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
The good life is one inspired by love and guided by knowledge.
If you wish to be loved, show more of your faults than your virtues
The greatest gift that you can give to others is the gift of unconditional love and acceptance.
To love is nothing. To be loved is something. But to love and be loved, that’s everything
If you remember me, then I don’t care if everyone else forgets
Love is an act of endless forgiveness, a tender look which becomes a habit
When we are in love we seem to ourselves quite different from what we were before
Happiness isn’t getting what you want, it’s wanting what you got
"Music is love, love is music, music is life, and I love my life. Thank you and good night."
Best lesson I ever learned in life came from the worst feeling I ever felt in life
"Spread love everywhere you go. Let no one ever come to you without leaving happier."
"Money can buy you a fine dog, but only love can make him wag his tail."
"Missing you is the hardest thing I've got to deal with\u0009"
"The love of family and the admiration of friends is much more important than wealth and privilege."
Love is a better teacher than duty.
Someday you will look back and know exactly why it had to happy
An anniversary is a reminder as to why you love and married this person.
When you love someone all your saved up wishes start coming out.
True love is quiescent, except in the nascent moments of true humility.
"Love and compassion are necessities\\, not luxuries. Without them humanity cannot survive."
The thought of kissing you keeps me awake at night\u0009
A good heart is always breaking\u0009
"I pushed everyone else away because they weren't you\u0009"
I fell in love with the way you touched me without using your hands\u0009
"Morning without you is a dwindled dawn."
We are each of us angels with only one wing, and we can only fly by embracing one another.
There is no charm equal to tenderness of heart.
I reward loyalty with loyalty. I rewart disloyalty with distance
"The worst feeling is when you feel like you're annoying the only person you wanna talk to"
It felt like heaven when you kissed me so I ignored all the times you put me through hell
The first kiss is the last to be forgotten\u0009
Tradition wears a snowy beard, romance is always young.
Stop looking for happiness in the same place you lost it \u0009
"My heart is like a singing bird."
"All the beautiful sentiments in the world weigh less than a single lovely action."
"Love is the silent saying and saying of a single name."
"You don't love someone because they're perfect, you love them in spite of the fact that they're not."
"Find someone who believes in you when you don't"
"What is a kiss? Why this, as some approve: The sure, sweet cement, glue, and lime of love."
"They say don't look back, but sometimes it's important to see how far you've come"
"It's about who you miss at 2 in the afternoon when you're busy, not 2 in the morning when you're lonely"
"Be with someone who makes your Monday's feel like Friday's"
I wish I had the power to ignore you like you ignore me
"Everytime my phone buzzes I hope it's you missing me"
"I'm in love with the idea of you and me still together in the future"
"Missing you comes in waves. Tonight I'm drowning"
Is this not the true romantic feeling; not to desire to escape life, but to prevent life from escaping you.
I would rather spend one lifetime with you, than face all the ages of this world alone
"Distance sometimes lets you know who's worth keeping and who's worth letting go"
"The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart."
"Everybody wants something to happen but everybody's too afraid to make the first move"
The human heart always forgives no matter what it is told
Some eyes touch you more than hands ever could
"The same eyes that taught me to love, taught me I'd never be good enough to be loved back"
"I'm homesick for arms that don't want to hold me"
"We must let go of the life we have planned\\, so as to accept the one that is waiting for us."
I wonder what goes through your mind when someone mentions my name to you
"I saw him, and I couldn't differentiate between my heart breaking and my heart fluttering"
"Nothing is impossible, the word itself says I am possible!"
"My loyalty runs real deep that's why I'm extra selective on who I give my loyalty out to"
My mission in life is not merely to survive, but to thrive; and to do so with some passion, some compassion, some humor, and some style.
I say its his loss but ddep down I know its mine too
Everybody is a main character to someone
I want a relationship with someone who never has me guessing where I stand with them
"Just because you took longer than other, doesn't mean you failed. Remember that"
"How a person reacts to your sadness says a lot about how long they're going to be in your life"
"I hate you because I will have to wonder for the rest of my life why I wasn't enough\u0009"
We build stories in our heads and we stick to them until you are finished or they finish us
"Sometimes you have to accept that people's part in your story is over"
Perfection is not attainable, but if we chase perfection we can catch excellence.
"Be faithful to that which exists within yourself."
